thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 8 of 25
thread.title: B.

author: B.
title: B.
text:
Too little time is afforded to submit a meter reading: about 5 days should be allowed. I was disappointed that the estimated reading used to calculate the last bill was so wildly inaccurate.
Also my query about how exactly the estimate was calculated was not answered. The estimate could not have been calculated, by either ESB networks or Energia, on my record of consumption.
However the service and billing is otherwise very good.
